transition.label: close_HM?
Turning the device off from all possible states

template.name: Button

transition.label: (y >= 4000 && activate_other == true && transfer_complete == true && Arang == true)
close_HM!
reset()
x >= 10000 && bAlarm_rang==true && Arang==true
Recording_ends!
recording_ended = true, x = 0, a1=0, a2=0, clk = 0

template.name: AlarmController

transition.label: Battery_low?
Arang = false, flag[0] = true, bAlarm_rang = false
Patient_emgr?
alerted = true
Press for 10 seconds when Patient feel uncomfortable
system_started == true && activate_other == true && alerted == false && recording_ended == false && a1==0
Leads_off!
a1+=1
system_started == true && activate_other == true && alerted == false && recording_ended == false && a2==0
Patient_emgr!
a2+=1
Arang == true && system_started == true && activate_other==true && num_restarts > 0
Battery_low!
bLow=true, x=0
